entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022
